document.full_text: the woman who portrayed elly may clampett in the 1960s tv series "the beverly hillbillies" sued mattel inc. over the toy maker's production of a barbie doll that she says looks like her.
document.title: elly may versus barbie: beverly hillbilly sues mattel
lines_and_colors: the woman who portrayed elly may clampett in the 1960s tv series "the beverly hillbillies" sued mattel inc. over the toy maker's production of a barbie doll that she says looks like her.
